column5: Where does one go to buy gel coat? I have access to a commercial body shop supplier, so that is my first thought. Any ideas, knowledge???

At the gelcoat store. Any marine shop will have it for sale. CTC even sells the stuff.  edit: If you're never done gelcoat before, do yourself a big favour and don't just read what it says on the can... do some Googling.
Hamilton Fiberglass on Ottawa (I think) They should have almost everything you need for a glass boat resurection, including upholstry.
I think their still there just before barton st on the east sde.If not, dura chemicals on grays rd should have it stock.
Composites Canada Mississauga  Progress Plastics Mississauga  Fiberglass Factory Mississauga/Brampton area
About 15 years ago, I bought some gel coat repair kit deal. What a mistake. I would never do it myself again.
